docs.title: Quick Start — Seed Resolver
docs.notes: Clean messy seed lists before ActorGraph. ~5 min. (Alpha)

docs.title: Quick Start — ActorGraph
docs.notes: Build social networks from LinkedIn. ~15 min.

docs.title: Quick Start — OrgGraph US
docs.notes: Build funder networks from IRS 990-PF data. ~10 min.

docs.title: Quick Start — OrgGraph CA
docs.notes: Build funder networks from Canada Charity/T3010 data. ~10 min.

docs.title: Quick Start — CloudProjects
docs.notes: Browse and manage saved network projects and bundles.

docs.title: Quick Start — InsightGraph
docs.notes: Analyze networks and generate insight reports. ~5 min.

docs.title: InsightGraph — Metrics Calculation Guide v2.0
docs.notes: How network metrics are calculated. For Sarah's data science review.

docs.title: InsightGraph v1.0 — Product Promise
docs.notes: Scope contract defining what v1.0 guarantees and does not guarantee.

actorgraph.name: ActorGraph
actorgraph.description: People-centered network graphs from LinkedIn data. Build nodes/edges, compute metrics, and export clean bundles.

orggraph_us.name: OrgGraph US
orggraph_us.description: U.S. foundations, grantees, and board networks from IRS 990 filings. Exports Polinode-ready workbooks + bundles.

orggraph_ca.name: OrgGraph CA
orggraph_ca.description: Canadian nonprofit + foundation networks (Canada Charity/T3010). Mirrors US schema where possible for cross-analysis.

insightgraph.name: InsightGraph
insightgraph.description: Network-type-aware analysis, broker roles, overlap detection, and narrative-ready insight outputs.

cloudprojects.name: CloudProjects
cloudprojects.description: Shared project bundles, exports, and artifacts. Canonical place for merged files and demo assets.

seed_resolver.name: Seed Resolver
seed_resolver.description: Resolve messy seed lists into canonical entities (people/orgs), with review-ready matches before analysis.

projects.title: GLFN Demo
projects.description: Great Lakes Funders Network demo assets for OrgGraph US + OrgGraph CA + InsightGraph workflows.

inputs.name: GLFN — Canada Charity Data (ZIP)
inputs.notes: OrgGraph CA demo input (Canadian charity dataset).

inputs.name: GLFN — US IRS 990 XML (ZIP)
inputs.notes: OrgGraph US demo input (IRS 990 XML filings).

outputs.name: GLFN — Polinode Export (XLSX)
outputs.notes: Known-good workbook that imports cleanly into Polinode (nodes + edges).

outputs.name: GLFN — InsightGraph Report (HTML)
outputs.notes: Shareable example report generated from linked GLFN networks.

projects.title: HOW Coalition Demo
projects.description: Healing Our Waters coalition seed inputs for Seed Resolver + ActorGraph demo runs.

inputs.name: HOW Coalition — Seed Sets (ZIP)
inputs.notes: Combined seed sets; useful for Seed Resolver and ActorGraph.

schema.title: Schema & Conventions
schema.description: Cross-app naming rules, role vocabulary, bundle structure, and export conventions.
